Name: Max
Text: Slippery Slide: Play this card to make all opponents' penguins slip and slide, causing them to shuffle to random players.

Name: Rob
Text: Penguin Parade: Swap one of your penguins with another player's penguin, but only if you both do a silly penguin dance together!

Name: Danny
Text: Fish Frenzy: All penguins go crazy for fish! Players must shout "Fish!" and grab the nearest card before it gets stolen.

Name: Evan
Text: Penguin Teleport: Send a penguin on a magical journey to another player's collection. Abracadabra, it's theirs now!

Name: Thalor
Text: Frostbite: Freeze an opponent's penguin for one turn, making them skip their next action.

Name: Mirael
Text: Aurora Shield: Protect your penguins from all attacks until your next turn.

Name: Gorvik
Text: Icebreaker: Break through any trap card and continue your action as normal.

Name: Seraphine
Text: Mystic Flippers: Swap the position of any two penguins on the board.

Name: Bramble
Text: Shadow Dive: Hide one of your penguins from all effects until your next turn.
